title: Test Scenario DSL
description: A test scenario with test cases to validate the business process.

testCases.description: The test cases of the scenario.

TestCase.description: A test case with instructions to validate the business process.

name.description: The name of the test case.

description.description: The description of the test case. Optional.

instructions.description: The instructions of the test case.

TestCaseInstruction.description: An instruction to define an action or an assertion to be performed in a test case.

CreateProcessInstanceInstruction.description: An instruction to create a new process instance.

processDefinitionSelector.description: The selector to identify the process definition to create the process instance for.

variables.description: The variables to create the process instance with. Optional.

startInstructions.description: The instructions to execute when starting the process instance. Optional.

elementId.description: The ID of the element to start the process instance at.

runtimeInstructions.description: The instructions to affect the runtime behavior of the process instance. Optional.

oneOf.description: An instruction to terminate the process instance at a specific element.

type.description: The type of the runtime instruction.

afterElementId.description: The ID of the element after which to terminate the process instance.

BroadcastSignalInstruction.description: An instruction to broadcast a signal.

signalName.description: The name of the signal to broadcast.

variables.description: The variables to broadcast with the signal. Optional.

ProcessDefinitionSelector.description: A selector to identify a process definition.

processDefinitionId.description: The ID of the process definition.

DecisionSelector.description: A selector to identify a decision.

decisionDefinitionId.description: The ID of the decision definition.

decisionDefinitionName.description: The name of the decision definition.

AssertDecisionInstruction.description: An instruction to assert the evaluation of a decision.

decisionSelector.description: The selector to identify the decision.

output.description: The expected output of the decision. Can be any JSON type. Optional.

matchedRules.description: The expected matched rule indexes. Optional.

notMatchedRules.description: The expected not matched rule indexes. Optional.

noMatchedRules.description: Whether to assert that no rules were matched. Defaults to false.

CompleteUserTaskInstruction.description: An instruction to complete a user task.

userTaskSelector.description: The selector to identify the user task to complete.

variables.description: The variables to set when completing the user task. Ignored if useExampleData is true. Optional.

useExampleData.description: Whether to complete the user task with example data from the BPMN element. If true, the variables property is ignored. Defaults to false.

AssertProcessInstanceInstruction.description: An instruction to assert the state of a process instance.

processInstanceSelector.description: The selector to identify the process instance.

state.description: The expected state of the process instance. Optional.

hasActiveIncidents.description: Whether the process instance has active incidents. Optional.

ProcessInstanceSelector.description: A selector to identify a process instance.

processDefinitionId.description: The process definition ID of the process instance.

AssertProcessInstanceMessageSubscription.description: An instruction to assert the state of a process instance message subscription.

processInstanceSelector.description: The selector to identify the process instance.

messageSelector.description: The selector to identify the message.

state.description: The expected state of the message subscription.

MessageSelector.description: A selector to identify a message.

correlationKey.description: The correlation key of the message. Optional.

AssertElementInstanceInstruction.description: An instruction to assert the state of an element instance.

processInstanceSelector.description: The selector to identify the process instance.

elementSelector.description: The selector to identify the element.

state.description: The expected state of the element instance.

amount.description: The expected amount of element instances in the given state. Defaults to 1.

AssertElementInstancesInstruction.description: An instruction to assert the state of multiple element instances.

processInstanceSelector.description: The selector to identify the process instance.

elementSelectors.description: The selectors to identify the elements.

state.description: The expected state of the element instances.

ElementSelector.description: A selector to identify a BPMN element.

elementId.description: The ID of the BPMN element.

elementName.description: The name of the BPMN element.

AssertUserTaskInstruction.description: An instruction to assert the state of a user task.

userTaskSelector.description: The selector to identify the user task.

state.description: The expected state of the user task. Optional.

assignee.description: The expected assignee of the user task. Optional.

candidateGroups.description: The expected candidate groups of the user task. Optional.

priority.description: The expected priority of the user task. Optional.

elementId.description: The expected element ID of the user task. Optional.

name.description: The expected name of the user task. Optional.

dueDate.description: The expected due date of the user task in ISO-8601 format. Optional.

followUpDate.description: The expected follow-up date of the user task in ISO-8601 format. Optional.

CompleteJobInstruction.description: An instruction to complete a job.

jobSelector.description: The selector to identify the job to complete.

variables.description: The variables to complete the job with. Optional.

useExampleData.description: Whether to complete the job with example data from the BPMN element. This property has precedence over variables. Defaults to false.

CompleteJobAdHocSubProcessInstruction.description: An instruction to complete a job of an ad-hoc sub-process.

jobSelector.description: The selector to identify the job to complete.

variables.description: The variables to complete the job with. Optional.

activateElements.description: The elements to activate in the ad-hoc sub-process. Optional.

elementId.description: The ID of the element to activate.

variables.description: The variables to set when activating the element. Optional.

cancelRemainingInstances.description: Whether to cancel remaining instances of the ad-hoc sub-process. Defaults to false.

completionConditionFulfilled.description: Whether the completion condition of the ad-hoc sub-process is fulfilled. Defaults to false.

CompleteJobUserTaskListenerInstruction.description: An instruction to complete a job of a user task listener.

jobSelector.description: The selector to identify the job to complete.

denied.description: Whether the worker denies the work. Defaults to false.

deniedReason.description: The reason for denying the job. Optional.

corrections.description: The corrections to apply to the user task. Optional. Only applicable if denied is false.

assignee.description: The assignee of the task. Optional.

dueDate.description: The due date of the task. Optional.

followUpDate.description: The follow up date of the task. Optional.

candidateUsers.description: The candidate users of the task. Optional.

candidateGroups.description: The candidate groups of the task. Optional.

priority.description: The priority of the task. Optional.

JobSelector.description: A selector to identify a job.

elementId.description: The ID of the BPMN element.

processDefinitionId.description: The process definition ID of the job.

UserTaskSelector.description: A selector to identify a user task.

elementId.description: The ID of the BPMN element.

taskName.description: The name of the user task.

processDefinitionId.description: The process definition ID of the user task.

IncidentSelector.description: A selector to identify an incident.

elementId.description: The ID of the BPMN element where the incident occurred.

processDefinitionId.description: The process definition ID of the incident.

PublishMessageInstruction.description: An instruction to publish a message.

correlationKey.description: The correlation key of the message. Optional.

variables.description: The variables to publish with the message. Optional.

timeToLive.description: The time-to-live of the message in milliseconds. Optional.

messageId.description: The message ID for uniqueness. Optional.

CorrelateMessageInstruction.description: An instruction to correlate a message.

correlationKey.description: The correlation key of the message. Optional.

variables.description: The variables to correlate with the message. Optional.

ResolveIncidentInstruction.description: An instruction to resolve an incident.

incidentSelector.description: The selector to identify the incident to resolve.

SetTimeInstruction.description: An instruction to set the time.

time.description: The time to set, in ISO 8601 instant format (e.g., "2026-01-19T13:00:00Z").

MockDmnDecisionInstruction.description: An instruction to mock a DMN decision.

decisionDefinitionId.description: The decision definition ID to mock.

variables.description: The variables to set as the decision output. Optional.

MockChildProcessInstruction.description: An instruction to mock a child process.

processDefinitionId.description: The ID of the child process to mock.

variables.description: The variables to set for the mocked child process. Optional.

MockJobWorkerCompleteJobInstruction.description: An instruction to mock a job worker who completes jobs.

jobType.description: The job type to mock. This should match the zeebeJobType in the BPMN model.

variables.description: The variables to complete the job with. Optional.

useExampleData.description: Whether to use example data from the BPMN element. If true, the variables property is ignored. Defaults to false.

AssertVariablesInstruction.description: An instruction to assert the variables of a process instance.

processInstanceSelector.description: The selector to identify the process instance.

elementSelector.description: The selector to identify the element for local variables. Optional.

variables.description: The expected variables with their values. Optional.

EvaluateConditionalStartEventInstruction.description: An instruction to evaluate conditional start events.

variables.description: The variables to evaluate the conditional start events with.

MockJobWorkerThrowBpmnErrorInstruction.description: An instruction to mock a job worker who throws BPMN errors.

jobType.description: The job type to mock. This should match the zeebeJobType in the BPMN model.

errorCode.description: The error code to throw. This should match the error code in an error catch event.

errorMessage.description: The error message to include when throwing the error. Optional.

variables.description: The variables to include when throwing the error. Optional.

DecisionDefinitionSelector.description: A selector to identify a decision definition.

decisionDefinitionId.description: The ID of the decision definition.

EvaluateDecisionInstruction.description: An instruction to evaluate a DMN decision.

decisionDefinitionSelector.description: The selector to identify the decision definition to evaluate.

variables.description: The variables to evaluate the decision with. Optional.

IncreaseTimeInstruction.description: An instruction to increase the time.

duration.description: The duration to increase the time by, in ISO 8601 duration format (e.g., "PT1H", "P2D").

ThrowBpmnErrorFromJobInstruction.description: An instruction to throw a BPMN error from a job.

jobSelector.description: The selector to identify the job to throw the error from.

errorMessage.description: The error message to throw. Optional.

variables.description: The variables to set when throwing the error. Optional.

UpdateVariablesInstruction.description: An instruction to create or update process instance variables.

processInstanceSelector.description: The selector to identify the process instance.

variables.description: The variables to create or update.

elementSelector.description: The selector to identify the element for local variables. Optional.
